sense.gloss: (East Asian) rainy season (in Japan, usu. from early June to mid-July)
Japanese apricot (Prunus mume), Japanese plum, ume, Chinese plum
umeboshi, pickled dried ume, pickled dried plum
entering the rainy season, beginning of the rainy season
ume liqueur, Japanese plum brandy, unripe ume infused in liquor (esp. shōchū) with added sugar
white plum blossoms, white Japanese apricot, white-blossomed plum
red-blossomed plum tree, red Japanese apricot
pine, bamboo and plum (an auspicious grouping)
high, middle and low (ranking), top, middle and bottom, upper, medium, lower, first, second and third (class)
arrangement, assignment, adjustment, handling, dealing with
Japanese apricot orchard, plum orchard, plum garden, ume orchard
serving one's lord well (of a retainer)
plum tree which blossoms in winter, early-flowering plum tree, early plum blossoms
long spell of rain in early spring
plum blossoms (as a harbinger of spring)
overcast sky in the rainy season
winter plum tree with reddish blossoms
era during early 1900s dominated by the grand champions Hitachiyama and Umegatani II
era during early 1900s dominated by the grand champions Hitachiyama and Umegatani II
plum blossom design, silk fabric with a plum blossom design
Bungo Japanese apricot, Prunus mume var. bungo
Chinese bushberry, bush cherry, Prunus japonica

sdata.j: ↑塩梅↑↓あんばい↓はいかがですか。
sdata.e: How do you feel?

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓りましたね。
sdata.e: The rainy season has set in.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ってしまったね。
sdata.e: The rainy season has set in.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓った。
sdata.e: The rainy season has set in.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓が↑始↑↓はじ↓まった。
sdata.e: The rainy season has set in.

sdata.j: もうすぐ↑梅雨入↑↓つゆい↓りだ。
sdata.e: The rainy season is near at hand.

sdata.j: もう↑２↑↓に↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓かそこらで↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓も↑終↑↓お↓わるでしょう。
sdata.e: The rainy season will be over in another two weeks or so.

sdata.j: とうとう↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓が↑終↑↓お↓わったようだ。
sdata.e: It seems that the rainy season is over at last.

sdata.j: いい↑塩梅↑↓あんばい↓だ。
sdata.e: The seasoning is just right.

sdata.j: ↑今年↑↓ことし↓は↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓が↑早↑↓はや↓く↑始↑↓はじ↓まると↑思↑↓おも↓いますか。
sdata.e: Do you think the rainy season will set in early this year?

sdata.j: ↑今年↑↓ことし↓は↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓↑明↑↓あ↓けが↑遅↑↓おそ↓かった。
sdata.e: The end of the rainy season came late this year.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑梅↑↓うめ↓の↑花↑↓はな↓で↑有名↑↓ゆうめい↓な↑水戸↑↓みと↓↑公園↑↓こうえん↓を↑見↑↓み↓に↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: We visited Mito Park, which is famous for its plum blossoms.

sdata.j: ↑天気↑↓てんき↓↑予報↑↓よほう↓によれば、まもなく↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓るそうだ。
sdata.e: According to the weather forecast, the rainy season will set in before long.

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓では↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓は↑普通↑↓ふつう↓↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓に↑始↑↓はじ↓まる。
sdata.e: In Japan, the rainy season usually begins in June.

sdata.j: ↑梅↑↓うめ↓の↑花↑↓はな↓は↑３月↑↓さんがつ↓にさく。
sdata.e: Plum blossoms come out in March.

sdata.j: ↑梅↑↓うめ↓の↑花↑↓はな↓は↑今週↑↓こんしゅう↓が↑見頃↑↓みごろ↓です。
sdata.e: The plum blossoms are at their best this week.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓です。
sdata.e: It is our rainy season.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓はいつ↑終↑↓お↓わるのかしら。
sdata.e: I wonder when the rainy season will end.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓はいつ↑明↑↓あ↓けるの？
sdata.e: When will the rainy season be over?

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓は↑六月↑↓ろくがつ↓の↑終↑↓お↓わり↑頃↑↓ころ↓に↑始↑↓はじ↓まる。
sdata.e: The rainy season sets in about the end of June.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓らしく↑空↑↓そら↓はどんよりしている。
sdata.e: The sky is gloomy and gray - a typical rainy-season sky.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨入↑↓つゆい↓りは↑来週↑↓らいしゅう↓↑以降↑↓いこう↓になりそうだ。
sdata.e: It looks like the rainy season is going to start after next week.

sdata.j: ↑梅村↑↓うめむら↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓が↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてくださる。
sdata.e: Mr Umemura teaches us English.

sdata.j: ↑万↑↓まん↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑明日↑↓あした↓↑梅雨↑↓づゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ったらどうしよう。
sdata.e: What if the rainy season should set in tomorrow.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あす↓から↑梅雨↑↓ばいう↓↑前線↑↓ぜんせん↓が↑活発↑↓かっぱつ↓になります。
sdata.e: The seasonal rain front is moving in tomorrow.

sdata.j: うっとうしい↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓↑期↑↓き↓に、すっきりしない↑話↑↓はなし↓で↑恐縮↑↓きょうしゅく↓ですが、↑少↑↓しょう↓しの↑間↑↓はざま↓お↑付↑↓つ↓き↑合↑↓あ↓いください。
sdata.e: I'm ashamed to tell such a muddled story in this dreary, rainy season, but please bear with me for a while.

sdata.j: ↑梅毒↑↓ばいどく↓は↑性行為↑↓せいこうい↓を↑通↑↓つう↓じて↑感染↑↓かんせん↓する↑病気↑↓びょうき↓です。
sdata.e: Syphilis is an infection that can be transmitted through sexual intercourse.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓の↑晴↑↓は↓れ↑間↑↓ま↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓↑物↑↓もの↓を↑干↑↓ほ↓すと↑気分↑↓きぶん↓はもう↑夏↑↓なつ↓でした。
sdata.e: Drying the washing on a fine day in the rainy season; I felt like it was already summer.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓↑時↑↓じ↓は↑雨降↑↓あめふ↓りが↑多↑↓おお↓くて↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓が↑立↑↓た↓てにくい。
sdata.e: It rains so often in the wet season that it's hard to plan outings.

sdata.j: ↑梅雨↑↓つゆ↓↑時↑↓じ↓でもないんだから、↑傘↑↓かさ↓は↑要↑↓い↓らないんじゃない。
sdata.e: Since it's not the rainy season, there's no need for an umbrella.
